00024 #ifndef __MT_SINGLETON_H__
00025 #define __MT_SINGLETON_H__
00026 
00027 #include <import/sys.h>
00028 #include "mt/CriticalSection.h"
00029 
00030 namespace mt
00031 {
00032 
00072 template<typename T, bool AutoDestroy = false>
00073 class Singleton
00074 {
00075 public:
00079     static T& getInstance();
00080 
00087     static void destroy();
00088 
00089 protected:
00091     inline explicit Singleton()
00092     {
00093         assert(mInstance == 0);
00094         mInstance = static_cast<T*>(this);
00095     }
00097     inline ~Singleton() { mInstance = 0; }
00098 
00099 private:
00100     static T* mInstance; //static instance
00101     static sys::Mutex mMutex; //static mutex for locking access to the instance
00102     inline explicit Singleton(Singleton const&) {}
00103     inline Singleton& operator=(Singleton const&) { return *this; }
00104 };
00105 
00106 template<typename T, bool AutoDestroy>
00107 T& Singleton<T, AutoDestroy>::getInstance()
00108 {
00109     //double-checked locking
00110     if (mInstance == 0)
00111     {
00112         CriticalSection<sys::Mutex> obtainLock(&mMutex);
00113         if (mInstance == 0)
00114         {
00115             mInstance = new T; //create the instance
00116             if (AutoDestroy)
00117             {
00118                 atexit(destroy); //register the destroy function
00119             }
00120         }
00121     }
00122     return *mInstance;
00123 }
00124 
00125 template<typename T, bool AutoDestroy>
00126 void Singleton<T, AutoDestroy>::destroy()
00127 {
00128     //double-checked locking
00129     if (mInstance != 0)
00130     {
00131         CriticalSection<sys::Mutex> obtainLock(&mMutex);
00132         if (mInstance != 0)
00133         {
00134             //we are OK to delete it
00135             delete mInstance;
00136             mInstance = 0;
00137         }
00138     }
00139 }
00140 
00141 template<typename T, bool AutoDestroy> T* Singleton<T, AutoDestroy>::mInstance = 0;
00142 template<typename T, bool AutoDestroy> sys::Mutex Singleton<T, AutoDestroy>::mMutex;
00143 
00144 }
00145 #endif
